title: Kamala Harris Says Trump tanked deal for border security #politics #shorts
description:
Vice President Kamala Harris pledged to find bipartisan agreement on the US-Mexico border at a rally in Georgia, seeking to blunt a line of attack from her rival Donald Trump and address one of her campaignâ€™s biggest political liabilities.
